import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {login} from '../actions/userAction' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import {Form , Button , Col , Row} from 'react-bootstrap' const LoginScreen = ({location,history}) => { const [email , setEmail] = useState('') const [password , setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { loading , error , userInfo} = userLogin const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1]:'/' useEffect (() => { console.log(userInfo) if(userInfo.length != 0){ history.push(redirect) } },[userInfo , history , redirect]) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email,password)) } return
